name: 無機化學專題討論（一）
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
description: Knowledge of current movements and interests in Inorganic Chemistry Capable of reviewing a research area and able to present it
goals: Knowledge of current movements and interests in Inorganic Chemistry
syllabus:
Current literatures for years 2016-2017, the topics may include but not limit to the following:   
1\. Inorganic compounds with quintuple bonds   
2\. Molecular wire   
3\. Ruthenium complexes and dye-sensitized solar cell   
4\. Metal cluster and conductivities  
5\. Oxygenase and model compounds
